title: Bug 17703 - EditAdd Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When you select a Compilation Unit (CU) in the Packages view and execute the 'File > Add Task' action using F1, you observe that you get a different dialog than when you execute the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR: The 'File > Add Task' action in the Packages view should use the same dialog as the Java editor's ruler context menu.
